SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.core.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.core.model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a deck in the game. It implements Serializable interface. It maintains the cards, configFile, typeOfCard, and empty status of the deck.
See Also:
